summary: This is an email from September 30, 2020, forwarding a draft letter dated September 28, 2020, from GM (likely a prosecutor) to Judge Nathan regarding discovery from other agencies in the Epstein case. The email asks for thoughts on the attached draft letter.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: The letter is addressed to Judge Nathan regarding discovery matters in the Epstein case.

connections.description: GM is writing a formal letter to Judge Nathan regarding discovery procedures in the case.

events.title: Draft Letter to Judge Nathan
events.description: A draft letter from GM to Judge Nathan regarding discovery from other agencies was prepared.

keyFacts: A draft letter regarding discovery from other agencies was prepared for Judge Nathan on September 28, 2020.
The email correspondence suggests ongoing legal coordination and review among prosecutors in the Epstein case.
The document indicates that discovery from agencies outside the immediate prosecution team was a subject of judicial communication.
